alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Price County through 430 PM CDT... At 400 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Prentice, or 25 miles southeast of Park Falls, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds may blow unsecured objects around. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Price County, including the following locations... Pike Lake, Musser Lake and Brantwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
